short_summary: 76 ISO container locking wheels and 14 tow bars
description: Tender for the supply of 76 ISO container locking wheels and 14 tow bars for use by the Canadian Coast Guard.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
